testSteps.description: User is searching for a contact and typing a message in the chat to send it

assertions.text: Send message button should be visible

evidence.description: Send button (green circle with arrow) visible in bottom-right while keyboard is active and user is in the 'Me' chat
Send button remains visible as user types 'Hello' in the message input field
Send button clearly visible as complete message 'Hello test message!' is shown in the input field
After message is sent, the message appears in the chat thread confirming the send button was functional

assertions.explanation: The send message button (green circular button with a paper plane icon) is consistently visible throughout the message composition flow. It appears in frames 8-27 when the user is in the 'Me' conversation view typing a message. The button is clearly visible in the bottom-right corner of the screen, positioned to the right of the text input area, and maintains standard WhatsApp styling with a green background and white send icon.
